actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the recipient of a veteran's pension or dependency and indemnity compensation will not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of cost-of-living increases in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: States that recipients of veterans' pensions and compensation shall not have the amount of such pension or compensation reduced because of increases in social security benefits.
